sources.title: Solution Accelerator: General Data Protection Regulation - Informatica
sources.snippet: What is GDPR? GDPR is a regulation that requires businesses to protect the personal data and privacy of individuals in EU member states. And non-compliance could cost companies dearly. Companies that collect, store, or use data on individuals in the European Union (EU) countries need to comply with strict new rules around protecting customer data.
